item.description:
All,
With the Nov meet-up happening next week, I'm happy to announce the December one:
We've got a great agenda for the December meetup with 2 CEOs & one stealth-mode start-up:

1. David Roth - Founder & CEO at stealth-mode start-up Appfirst will debut their Beta program.
If you check the website, there's not much there, so that's another god reason to show-up!

2. George Adams, CEO of SSH Communications will be giving a talk about encryption and security during data in motion (end to end). Steve Primost will add a couple of "architecture' /"under the hood" slides for technical perspective.

Regards,
Tsahy.

group.name: Boston Cloud Services - All things Cloud, SaaS, PaaS, XaaS

item.name: Boston Cloud services December Meetup
